column5: I will be going to ignace next week.mostly elephant lake.I need info about the mayfly hatch.has it started,how bad is it.thanks in advance!!!
I don't know about Ignace Ont, but down on Lake St. Clair and Anchor Bay they have started but are not yet at full force.
Terry, don't worry about the mayflies. We did pretty good a few years ago at Eagle Lake with the hatch. Have a great time, catch another 11lb eye for me.
